com.mygdx.game.obstacles

Class SpikyObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.obstacles.Obstacle
      • com.mygdx.game.obstacles.SpikyObstacle

  • public class SpikyObstacle
extends Obstacle
    This class is the blueprint of the spikyObstacles unlike the other classes it has an additional checkCollision method. When spiderBoi touches the surface it dies and the game returns to the level selection screen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpikyObstacle(int x, int y)
      Constructor for the spiky obstacle, calls the parent constructor, it also initialises the image and the coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkCollision(SpiderBoi spiderBoi)
      Checks for collisions between SpiderBoi and the SpikyObstacle, removes SpiderBoi if there is one.

      • Methods inherited from class com.mygdx.game.obstacles.Obstacle

        draw, getBoundary, getImage, getPosition, setImage, setPosition

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpikyObstacle

        public SpikyObstacle(int x,
                     int y)
        Constructor for the spiky obstacle, calls the parent constructor, it also initialises the image and the coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the obstacle.
        y - is the y coordinate of the obstacle.

    • Method Detail

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(SpiderBoi spiderBoi)
        Checks for collisions between SpiderBoi and the SpikyObstacle, removes SpiderBoi if there is one.
        Overrides:
        checkCollision in class Obstacle
        Parameters:
        spiderBoi - is the main character it will be checked if it collides with the SpikyObstacle.
        Returns:
        a boolean value if it collides returns true if not returns false.
